page.title: 12HORTICULTURE EGMANTON/LAXTON
page.content: Another type of farming is horticulture. Burnmoor Nurseries at Egmanton is a wholesale nursery specialising in house plants which are imported from Holland and Denamrk and kept in three large greenhouses and are supplied to shops and offices. There are 4 acres of market garden in Moorhouse growing potatoes, carrots, green vegetables etc., supplying local shops and hotels. There are 18 beehives at Vicarage Farm , Laxton, the main crop of honey is taken late May to early June as the oilseed rape crop provides the pollen, also fruit trees etc.
